org.Element

Class Lorann

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.Element.Element
      • org.Element.DynamicElement
        • org.Element.Mobile
          • org.Element.Lorann
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IElement, IMobile

    public class Lorann
extends Mobile
    The Lorann class. Which is our main character actually.
    Author:
    Florent, Axel, Luc, Romain;

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animate()
      Animates the element.
      void destroySpell()
      Destroys the current instance of the spell.
      void kill()
      Destroys the element, by removing it from the map, unregistering it from the dynamic elements list, and if the main character, loading the menu.

      Moves the element down by one tile.

      Moves the element diagonally down-left by one tile.

      Moves the element diagonally down-right by one tile.

      Moves the element left by one tile.

      Moves the element up by one tile.
